backend/main.mo: Main backend actor integrating authorization, storage, invite links, user profiles, PINs, notifications, and vehicle management with multiple public endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test IDs for tracking and verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of key frontend files across hooks, pages, components, and PWA setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and linking PWA manifest and icons.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic caching, fetch handling, and activation logic for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authenticated routing, layout, and page registrations for all app sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen for unauthorized access with optional admin-claim flow and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Renders the sign-in screen using Internet Identity with branding and a login button.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Displays the application logo at selectable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with header and footer logic based on authentication and onboarding state.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Provides a dialog for submitting a lost-vehicle report with validation and API mutation.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Provides a dialog for reporting a found vehicle, submitting a note via API.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Renders the main navigation header with logo, menus, notifications, and user actions.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Handles initiating a vehicle transfer, showing a PIN prompt and displaying the generated transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: A dialog prompting for PIN input with error handling before secure actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, claiming first admin, and fetching admin-only data like stats, invite codes, and registered vehicles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Contains hooks for fetching lost vehicles and marking vehicles as lost or found with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user notifications with polling and to mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Defines a mutation hook for completing onboarding and refreshing the user profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Offers mutations for setting up or updating a user PIN through actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch caller profile status via role inspection and a placeholder save mutation that throws.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Includes mutations for initiating and accepting vehicle transfers with relevant cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Contains hooks to fetch user vehicles, fetch a single vehicle, and register new vehicles with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page describing the app, its features, and contact info with UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Page for entering a transfer code and submitting it to accept vehicle ownership, with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system statistics and navigation to invite token and vehicle management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Allows admins to view, generate, and copy invite tokens, displaying used and unused tokens.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing counts of user vehicles, lost vehicles, and notifications, plus quick actions and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays and filters a list of reported lost vehicles with search, status badges, and detail cards.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications with timestamps and allows marking individual notifications as read.
Onboarding form where users submit an invite token and profile details to complete registration.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile screen showing the user’s Internet Identity principal and providing logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a vehicle with details and photo upload, submitting data via a mutation hook.
Manages creating and updating a user PIN with form validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific vehicle, including status, photo, and owner actions.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists the user’s registered vehicles with status badges and navigation to registration or detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, dark mode, extended colors, fonts, shadows, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining app summary, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features with versions.
